Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me due to its unique features and high-quality materials used. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special price. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it for $120. This offer is tailored to provide you with a great value while also ensuring a profitable transaction for me. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
